title: 2BD 2BA, Onsite playground, Oversized walk-in closets
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '946', 'Address:', '2001 Ramrod Ave', 'South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Onsite playground', 'Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Wood-style plank flooring', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', 'Convenient access to public transportation', 'Oversized walk-in closets', 'Fenced dog park with pet watering station', 'Exterior storage available', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
